question: I need a 60-minute practice for an intermediate player to improve my counter drops.
answer:
Duration: 60 min  
Session Focus: Improving Counter Drops

Rest between exercises: 1min30s

Warm-up (total 8–10 min)
1. 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive + 2 shots
2. 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive + 2 shots

Session

Condition Game 1
• 9 pts: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Forehand)
  (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive must involve a counter drop...)
• 9 pts: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Backhand)
  (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive must involve a counter drop...)
Rest 1 min 30 s

Condition Game 2
• 7 pts: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: all drives’ first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all counter drops must be hit low...)
• 7 pts: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Drive: all drives’ first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all counter drops must be hit low...)
Rest 1 min 30 s

Condition Game 3
• 9 pts: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Forehand)
  (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive must involve a counter drop...)
• 9 pts: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Backhand)
  (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive must involve a counter drop...)
Rest 1 min 30 s

End of session.
contexts:
Duration: 60 min
Session Focus: Dynamic Block Session (Archetype: Dynamic Block Session)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
### Warm-up ###
• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Cross-Boast-Drive + 2 shots
• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Cross-Boast-Drive + 2 shots

### Activity Block 1 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Forehand)
  (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall,...)
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Backhand)
  (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall,...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 2 ###
• 7 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 3 ###
• 7 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 4 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)
• 11 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 5 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)
• 11 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End of session.

Duration: 45 min
Session Focus: Drill Only (Archetype: Drill Only)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive + 2 shots
• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive-Drop-Drive + 2 shots

### Activity Block 1 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 2 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 3 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Backhand)
  (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall,...)

  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

  (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall,...)

  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 5 ###

  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)

End of session.

question: A need a 45min session to improve my counter drop
answer:
Duration: 45 min  
Session Focus: Counter Drop Improvement  
Rest between exercises: 1 min 30 s  

Warm-up (total 8 min)  
1. 4 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive + 2 shots  
2. 4 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Cross-Boast-Drive + 2 shots  

Session  

Activity Block 1  
1. 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Forehand)  
   (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive...)  
2. 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Backhand)  
   (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive...)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

Activity Block 2  
1. 9 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)  
   (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)  
2. 9 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Backhand)  
   (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

Activity Block 3  
1. 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Forehand)  
   (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall,...)  
2. 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Backhand)  
   (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall,...)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

Activity Block 4  
1. 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Forehand)  
   (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)  
2. 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Backhand)  
   (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

End of session.
